This field should contain an URL address of the IIIF collection manifest.
If you don't need the whole image, you can enter coordinates for desired region. Leave this as 'full' otherwise.
You can specify the image resolution.
The images can be rotated.
You can choose if you want your images in ful color, grayscale or just black and white.
Currently, only jpg format is supported.
You can specify a range of pages to download. Leaving these fields empty will result in the whole collection being saved. This may sometimes lead to very long wait times.
